title: Nebraska Lawmakers Override Veto; Abolish Death Penalty
teaser: Nebraska lawmakers have abolished the red state's death penalty. The governor had tried to veto a bill repealing the death penalty but the one-house legislature overrode the veto 30-19. Nebraska has executed only three prisoners since the 1950s, the last in 1997.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
